sentence.Network_en: His heart swelled out in roundelay of summer fields and clover.
sentence.Network_cn: 它的心在夏天的田野和苜宿中,因唱著婉转的短歌而起伏不定.

sentence.Network_en: Never pipe could ever play Better shepherd's roundelay.
sentence.Network_cn: 管笛难以赛过牧羊少年的美妙小曲.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(R) -亿城英语 ... roundel 圆形饰物 roundelay 圆舞 rounder 作圆之人.
和Luke一起看新闻扩大词汇量_英语杂谈... ... roundel,n, 圆形饰物,小圆盘 roundelay,n, 回旋曲,圆舞 Round Table,n, 圆桌会议.
四字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 四行〖 element〗 四旋体诗〖 roundelay〗 四言诗〖 thepoemeachlineofwhichconsistsoffourwords〗.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Old French rondelet, from rondel (see rondel). The change in the ending was due to association with the final syllable of virelay

means.word_mean: 1. a song in which a line or phrase is repeated as the refrain
